name: AR Archery: King of Bows
description:
Play the most exciting shooting game with the latest Augmented Reality (ARKit). Easy to set your darts board in your real environment and test your skill immediately.

AR Darts of King bring you a smooth and realistic AR experience in everywhere.

Rule: Try to get the highest score with 3 throwing darts in every turn. Easy to play even you have no idea about dart before.

If you need a simple but fun and interesting game, AR Darts of King is a perfect choice.

Share with your friend and enjoy the game!

More gamemode will come soon.

Explore more interesting AR applications with Vulcan Labs.

Let's keep playing!
